attributes.additional_details: The prime minister should  propose a solution in Syria   based upon the exile of Assad etc. to Iran with a redundancy package to  the value say,  of the missiles that   some halfwits " think" a solution. Use interim civil service rule  (they are fairly good) and a  UN. force with teeth. Guarantee the Russians their bases and rebuilding , jobs, medicine, education and training to their young people. Assad is finished his soldiers have no heart to fight but they are cornered,  surrounded by vengeful,merciless killers and are desperate for their lives and those of their families.
